subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The key to the Pacers’ defense is the 7-foot-2 center Roy Hibbert, who took care of the paint in Game 1, allowing teammates to guard the perimeter.
snippet: The key to the Pacers’ defense is the 7-foot-2 center Roy Hibbert, who took care of the paint in Game 1, allowing teammates to guard the perimeter.
